indexVar.description: The variable name to assign to the current iteration index.

updateExpression.description: An expression to update the index variable after each iteration.

total.description: The total number of iterations to perform.

endCondition.description: An expression that when true will exit the loop.

breakCondition.description: An expression that when true will exit the loop.

continueCondition.description: An expression that when true will skip to the next iteration.

loopEnd.description: The node(s) to execute after the loop ends.

next.description: The next node(s) to execute within the loop body.
